D

DeferredAssert - Class in com.oracle.tools.deferred
The DeferredAssert is a helper class that defines commonly used "assertThat" methods for the purposes of unit, functional and integration testing.
DeferredAssert() - Constructor for class com.oracle.tools.deferred.DeferredAssert
 
DeferredMatch<T> - Class in com.oracle.tools.deferred
A DeferredMatch is a Deferred that represents a Hamcrest Matcher, that of which must be satisfied for a specified Deferred object at some point in the future.
DeferredMatch(Deferred<T>, Matcher<?>) - Constructor for class com.oracle.tools.deferred.DeferredMatch
Constructs a DeferredMatch for the Deferred with the specified Matcher.
